workflow.name: Send weekly Google Ads performance reports with GPT-5.1 and Gmail
workflow.description:
Automatically analyzes your Google Ads performance every Monday and sends a comprehensive report to your inbox with AI-powered insights, week-over-week comparisons, and prioritized recommendations to optimize your campaigns.

## **How it works**

**Step 1: Schedule Weekly Analysis**

- Triggers automatically every Monday at midnight
- Can be customized to your preferred schedule
- Initiates the entire data collection and analysis process


**Step 2: Collect Performance Data**

- Fetches last 7 days of Google Ads data via API
- Retrieves previous 7 days of data (days 8-14) for comparison
- Extracts key metrics including impressions, clicks, cost, conversions, CTR, and CPA
- Calculates and summarizes performance for each week
- Identifies top performers, problem campaigns, and efficiency trends
- Merges data to create comprehensive week-over-week comparison


**Step 3: AI-Powered Analysis**

- Aggregates all performance data into a single view
- Sends data to AI Analyst powered by GPT-5.1
- AI analyzes trends, identifies insights, and spots anomalies
- Diagnoses root causes of performance changes
- Generates actionable, prioritized recommendations based on business impact
- Calculates efficiency metrics and budget optimization opportunities


**Step 4: Deliver Insights Report**

- Formats analysis into a professional HTML report
- Emails comprehensive insights directly to your inbox
- Includes executive summary, week-over-week comparison tables, and color-coded metrics
- Provides high/medium/low priority action items
- Ready for immediate action and strategy adjustments

## **What you'll get**

The workflow delivers a comprehensive weekly analysis with:

- **Performance Metrics**: Impressions, clicks, CTR, conversions, cost, CPA, and efficiency trends
- **Week-over-Week Comparison**: Side-by-side analysis with percentage changes and visual indicators
- **Top Performers Analysis**: Detailed breakdown of your best-performing campaigns
- **Issues & Performance Risks**: Identification of campaigns with high spend but zero conversions, declining CTR, or rising CPA
- **AI-Generated Insights**: Intelligent pattern recognition and trend analysis with root cause diagnosis
- **Actionable Recommendations**: Prioritized action items (high/medium/low) with expected impact and risk levels
- **Budget Efficiency Analysis**: Spend allocation recommendations and wasted spend identification
- **Campaign Intelligence**: Clear understanding of what's working and what needs attention
- **Data Confidence Assessment**: Commentary on sample size adequacy and metric reliability
- **Automated Delivery**: Weekly HTML report sent directly to your email without manual effort

## **Why use this**

- **Save time on reporting**: Eliminate 2-3 hours of manual weekly analysis and report creation
- **Never miss insights**: AI catches trends and patterns humans might overlook
- **Consistent monitoring**: Automated weekly reviews ensure you stay on top of performance
- **Data-driven decisions**: Make strategic adjustments based on comprehensive analysis with clear priorities
- **Early problem detection**: Spot performance issues and wasted spend before they impact your budget
- **Optimize continuously**: Regular insights enable ongoing campaign refinement
- **Focus on strategy**: Spend less time analyzing data, more time implementing improvements
- **Scalable intelligence**: Works whether you manage 1 campaign or 100
- **Executive-ready reports**: Professional HTML format suitable for sharing with stakeholders

## **Setup instructions**

Before you start, you'll need:

1. **Google Ads Account & API Access**
   - Go to your Google Ads account at [https://ads.google.com](https://ads.google.com/)
   - Find your Customer ID (XXX-XXX-XXXX format in top-right corner)
   - Get a Developer Token from Google Ads API Center
   - Enable API access for your account

2. **OpenAI API Key** (for GPT-5.1 AI analysis)
   - Sign up at [https://platform.openai.com](https://platform.openai.com/)
   - Navigate to API keys section and create a new key
   - Ensure you have access to GPT-5.1 model

3. **Gmail Account** (for receiving reports)
   - OAuth2 authentication will be used
   - No app password needed

## **Configuration steps:**

1. **Replace Google Ads Customer ID**: 
   - Open both "Get Last Week Data" and "Get Previous Week Data" HTTP Request nodes
   - In the URL field, replace `[Customer ID]` with your actual Customer ID (format: XXX-XXX-XXXX)

2. **Add Developer Token**:
   - In both HTTP Request nodes, add your Google Ads Developer Token to the header parameters

3. **Connect Google Ads OAuth2**: 
   - In both HTTP Request nodes, authenticate with your Google Ads credentials
   - Select your ad account

4. **Connect OpenAI credentials**: 
   - In the "OpenAI Chat Model" node, add your OpenAI API key
   - Verify GPT-5.1 model is selected

5. **Configure email delivery**: 
   - In the "Email Report to User" node, connect your Gmail OAuth2 credentials
   - Update the recipient email address (default: lee@sonalabs.com)
   - Customize subject line if desired

6. **Set your schedule** (optional): 
   - In the "Weekly Trigger" node, configure your preferred day and time
   - Default is Monday at midnight

7. **Test the workflow**:
   - Click "Execute Workflow" to run manually
   - Verify data pulls correctly from Google Ads
   - Check that AI analysis provides meaningful insights
   - Confirm email report arrives formatted correctly

8. **Customize analysis focus** (optional):
   - Open the "AI Analyst" node
   - Adjust the prompt to prioritize specific metrics or goals for your business
   - Modify thresholds for "problem campaigns" in the calculation nodes

9. **Activate automation**: 
   - Enable the workflow to run automatically every Monday
   - Monitor the first few reports to ensure accuracy

---

**Note:** The workflow analyzes the last 7 days vs. the previous 7 days, giving you rolling two-week comparisons every Monday. Adjust the date ranges in the HTTP Request nodes if you need different time periods.

parameters.text:
=You are a senior Google Ads performance analyst responsible for weekly account health reviews, budget efficiency, and optimization decisions.

Your role is NOT to summarize data.
Your role is to diagnose performance changes, identify root causes, quantify impact, and prioritize actions that protect or grow conversions.

You are analyzing campaign performance data comparing two consecutive weeks and must produce a comprehensive WEEKLY PERFORMANCE REVIEW formatted as a complete HTML document with inline CSS.

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
ANALYST BEHAVIOR RULES (CRITICAL)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
- Do NOT restate metrics unless comparing or interpreting them
- Always explain WHY a change matters, not just WHAT changed
- Prioritize insights by business impact (conversions, wasted spend, efficiency)
- Explicitly call out uncertainty or low sample sizes
- Assume the reader is a performance marketer or executive
- Make tradeoffs ‚Äî not everything can be ‚Äúhigh priority‚Äù

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
üìä LAST WEEK DATA (Most Recent)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
- Total Campaigns: {{ $json.last_week_data[0].total_campaigns }}
- Total Spend: ${{ $json.last_week_data[0].total_spend }}
- Total Clicks: {{ $json.last_week_data[0].total_clicks }}
- Total Impressions: {{ $json.last_week_data[0].total_impressions }}
- Total Conversions: {{ $json.last_week_data[0].total_conversions }}
- Top Campaigns: {{ JSON.stringify($json.last_week_data[0].top_campaigns, null, 2) }}
- Problem Campaigns: {{ JSON.stringify($json.last_week_data[0].zero_conversions_high_spend, null, 2) }}
- Low CTR Campaigns: {{ JSON.stringify($json.last_week_data[0].low_ctr_campaigns, null, 2) }}
- High Converters: {{ JSON.stringify($json.last_week_data[0].high_conversion_campaigns, null, 2) }}

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
üìä PREVIOUS WEEK DATA (2 Weeks Ago)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
- Total Campaigns: {{ $json.last_2_weeks_data[0].total_campaigns }}
- Total Spend: ${{ $json.last_2_weeks_data[0].total_spend }}
- Total Clicks: {{ $json.last_2_weeks_data[0].total_clicks }}
- Total Impressions: {{ $json.last_2_weeks_data[0].total_impressions }}
- Total Conversions: {{ $json.last_2_weeks_data[0].total_conversions }}
- Top Campaigns: {{ JSON.stringify($json.last_2_weeks_data[0].top_campaigns, null, 2) }}
- Problem Campaigns: {{ JSON.stringify($json.last_2_weeks_data[0].zero_conversions_high_spend, null, 2) }}
- Low CTR Campaigns: {{ JSON.stringify($json.last_2_weeks_data[0].low_ctr_campaigns, null, 2) }}
- High Converters: {{ JSON.stringify($json.last_2_weeks_data[0].high_conversion_campaigns, null, 2) }}

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
OUTPUT REQUIREMENTS
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
Format your entire response as a COMPLETE HTML document with inline CSS.
Output ONLY HTML ‚Äî no markdown, no explanations, no preamble.
Start with <!DOCTYPE html> and end with </html>.

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
REQUIRED SECTIONS (IN ORDER)
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê

üìà EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
- One-paragraph high-level verdict on week-over-week performance
- % changes in spend, clicks, impressions, and conversions
- Overall account trend: improving / declining / stable but inefficient
- Key wins (maximum 3)
- Major risks or red flags (maximum 3)
- Focus on impact, not volume

üìä WEEK-OVER-WEEK COMPARISON
- Use an HTML comparison table with columns:
  Metric | Last Week | Previous Week | Change (%) | Trend
- Include:
  - Total Spend
  - Total Clicks
  - Total Impressions
  - Total Conversions
  - Average CTR (calculated)
  - Average CPA (calculated)
- Apply green/red color coding and arrows based on direction

üèÜ TOP PERFORMERS ANALYSIS (LAST WEEK)
- Use an HTML table:
  Campaign | Impressions | Clicks | CTR | Conversions | Cost | CPA
- Compare against previous week when applicable
- Explain WHY these campaigns performed well (intent, efficiency, scale)
- Avoid generic praise

‚ö†Ô∏è ISSUES & PERFORMANCE RISKS
- Use an HTML table:
  Campaign | Issue Type | Week-over-Week Trend | Analyst Diagnosis | Recommended Action
- Flag:
  - High spend with zero conversions
  - CTR or CPA deterioration
  - New issues that did not exist last week

üìâ CAMPAIGNS WITH DECLINING PERFORMANCE
- Only include campaigns that got WORSE week-over-week
- Table columns:
  Campaign | Metric Declining | Last Week | Previous Week | % Change | Severity

üí∞ BUDGET EFFICIENCY & REALLOCATION
- Use an HTML table:
  Campaign | Last Week Spend | Previous Week Spend | Efficiency Trend | Recommendation
- Identify wasted spend
- Suggest budget shifts toward stronger performers
- Be decisive

üí° ACTIONABLE RECOMMENDATIONS (PRIORITIZED)
Group recommendations into:
üî¥ HIGH PRIORITY (This Week)
üü° MEDIUM PRIORITY (Next 1‚Äì2 Weeks)
üü¢ LOW PRIORITY (Strategic / Long-Term)

For EACH recommendation, include:
- Campaign(s) affected
- Triggering metric(s)
- Expected impact (cost savings or conversion lift)
- Risk level (Low / Medium / High)

üìê DATA CONFIDENCE & LIMITATIONS
- Comment on sample size adequacy
- Flag volatile metrics or low-confidence conclusions
- Note any anomalies or missing data
- If both weeks show zero data, recommend checking the API connection

üìå ANALYST VERDICT
- One sentence starting with:
  ‚ÄúOverall, this account is‚Ä¶‚Äù
- Be decisive and opinionated

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
STYLING REQUIREMENTS
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
Keep all existing styling rules exactly as before.

Comparison table styling:
.comparison-table td.positive { color: #0f9d58; font-weight: 600; }
.comparison-table td.negative { color: #d93025; font-weight: 600; }
.comparison-table .arrow-up::after { content: " ‚Üë"; }
.comparison-table .arrow-down::after { content: " ‚Üì"; }

‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
FINAL IMPORTANT RULES
‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê‚ïê
- Focus heavily on TRENDS, NOT static metrics
- Highlight the biggest positive and negative movers
- Do NOT exceed 5 high-priority recommendations
- If insights conflict, explain the tradeoff
- Think like an analyst who is accountable for results

parameters.content:
## Scheduling
- Currently triggers every monday midnight
- Can be modified

# üìä AI-Powered Google Ads Weekly Analyst

Automatically analyzes your Google Ads performance every Monday and sends a comprehensive report to your inbox.

## What it does
- Pulls campaign data from the last 2 weeks via Google Ads API
- Compares week-over-week performance metrics
- Identifies top performers and problem campaigns
- Calculates key metrics: CTR, CPA, spend efficiency, conversion trends
- Generates AI-powered insights and prioritized recommendations using GPT-5.1
- Emails a professional HTML report with executive summary and action items

## Setup Required
1. **Google Ads Customer ID**: Replace `[Customer ID]` in both HTTP Request node URLs
   - Format: XXX-XXX-XXXX (found in your Google Ads dashboard top-right)
2. **Developer Token**: Add your Google Ads Developer Token in the header parameters of both HTTP Request nodes
3. **Google Ads OAuth2**: Connect your Google Ads credentials
4. **Gmail OAuth2**: Connect your Gmail credentials for email delivery
5. **Email Recipient**: Update the recipient email in the "Email Report to User" node
6. **(Optional)** Adjust the schedule trigger timing

## Configuration
- **Runs:** Every Monday at midnight (configurable in Weekly Trigger node)
- **Analysis Period:** Last 7 days vs. previous 7 days
- **Report Format:** HTML email with tables, metrics, and color-coded insights

user.name: Sona Labs
user.bio: Sona provides developer APIs for company enrichment and buyer intelligence. Send a company domain, receive firmographics, technographics, revenue estimates, employee data, intent signals, buying stages and more. We're the data layer that transforms domains into actionable data for enriched company profiles and buyer intelligence.
